name: Z-Survive!
description:
Project made in 1 month for a Masters.

- Zombies that chase and attack player.

- Pedestrian walk randomly on the sidewalk and run away from Zombies.

- Car controller made from scratch.

- Simple story with a goal.

- IK used for aiming.

NOTE: Cars are using NavMeshAgent instead of a proper Driving AI that calls the actual CarController. The result is much worse but had to be done to speed up development.
